name: Loot & Looter
description:
Hi looter! Welcome to the richest dungeon of the world!

Here you will find the greatest treasure that man have ever seen.
But watch out! The more loot you have, the slower you move!
Now you are ready for the dungeon... Oh I was about to forget it... beware of the deadly skeleton guardians!

Good luck!

Game made in 72h for Ludum Dare 40: "The more you have, the worse it is"
